Name: Issue 356
Summary: MAUI UI July is in full swing!
Introduction: G'day everyone, welcome to issue #356 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities. In this issue there are some great blogs from the MAUI UI July series. People are also creating great guidance in regard to CI/CD for all the various MUAI Platforms. Also don't forget to keep an eye out for the [.NET Conf "Focus on MAUI"](https://focus.dotnetconf.net/) event which is heading up in a couple of weeks. Hope you have a code-worthy week, Kym

Articles.Title: MVVMS... A Better MVVM? Model-View-ViewModel-Services Explained
Articles.Description: If you are a C# and XAML developer you probably know about MVVM, but have you ever heard of MVVMS? It is the architecture pattern I have used in every application I have ever built since my first job at Canon years upon years ago! It is a simple but effective way of structing your code and going beyond MVVM to decouple logic into small services. This makes code more re-usable and testable. I break it all down!
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Singleton vs Transient - What's the Difference in .NET Dependency Injection?
Articles.Description: Singleton... Transient... When should you use what when building client apps and web apps with .NET? Registering your dependencies correctly has import implications when it comes to lifecycle events and how you users will interact with your application. I break down what you need to know.
